slides.description: We Are With You in Your Maritime Operations

footer.description: As NAVMAR Shipping Agency, we aim to be a reliable business partner in the global maritime network.
footer.portsFooter: İskenderun and Mersin Priority - All Ports in Turkey

services.title: Our Husbandry Services
services.subtitle: As NAVMAR Shipping Agency, we carefully and completely meet all the needs of your vessels

cta.title: Would You Like Detailed Information About Our Services?
cta.subtitle: We are ready to offer you customized solutions and answer your questions

portAgency.title: Port Agency
portAgency.description: We provide professional shipping agency services at all ports in Turkey, with priority at İskenderun and Mersin ports. We manage your vessels' port operations smoothly and efficiently.

crewChange.title: Crew Change
crewChange.description: We carry out crew changes smoothly and quickly. We coordinate airport transfers, visa procedures, and all official processes.

healthTransfer.title: Personnel Health Facility Transfer
healthTransfer.description: We provide safe transfer services to hospitals and health facilities for your crew's health needs. We coordinate emergency and planned health services.

provisioning.title: Provisioning, Spare Parts and Fresh Water Supply
provisioning.description: We meet your vessels' needs for provisions, food, spare parts, and fresh water. We offer quality products and on-time delivery guarantee.

customs.title: Spare Parts Customs Procedures
customs.description: We manage your spare parts' customs procedures quickly and completely. We ensure timely delivery by tracking all documents and procedures.

publications.title: Navigation Publications Supply
publications.description: We provide the supply of current sea charts, navigation publications, and nautical publications that your vessels need.

cashFuel.title: Cash and Fuel Supply to Vessels
cashFuel.description: We provide safe cash supply and fuel bunkering services to your vessels. We ensure your operations continue uninterrupted with competitive prices and on-time delivery.

waste.title: Waste Collection from Vessels
waste.description: We professionally provide waste collection and disposal services from vessels in accordance with environmental regulations.
features: Waste collection in accordance with MARPOL standards

ports.title: Ports We Serve
ports.subtitle: We provide professional shipping agency services at all ports in Turkey, with priority at İskenderun and Mersin ports

intro.title: Service at All Ports in Turkey
intro.description1: As NAVMAR Shipping Agency, we have a professional team specialized in shipping agency and husbandry services at all ports in Turkey, with priority at İskenderun and Mersin ports.
intro.description2: With our strong connections throughout Turkey and experienced staff, we quickly and reliably meet all the needs of your vessels. While providing priority service at İskenderun and Mersin ports, we are at your service 7/24 to provide professional solutions at all other ports in Turkey.

cta.title: Would You Like Service at Our Ports?
cta.subtitle: We are ready 7/24 to provide you with the best service at all ports in Turkey, with priority at İskenderun and Mersin

iskenderun.name: İskenderun Port
iskenderun.description: Strategic trade port of the Mediterranean, one of Turkey's most important container and general cargo ports

mersin.name: Mersin Port
mersin.description: Leading container port of the Mediterranean and one of Turkey's largest port complexes

about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: Your reliable solution partner in the maritime sector

company.name: NAVMAR Shipping Agency
company.description1: NAVMAR Shipping Agency is a professional shipping agency company serving with years of experience and knowledge in the maritime sector. We operate continuously at İskenderun Port.
company.description2: We were established to provide our clients with the highest quality husbandry services and help them carry out their maritime operations smoothly. We make a difference in the sector with our experienced team, strong local connections, and 7/24 uninterrupted communication infrastructure.
company.description3: We provide comprehensive solutions in all husbandry services such as crew change, provisioning, spare parts customs procedures, navigation publications supply, fuel and cash supply, waste collection. We understand each client's specific needs and develop customized solutions for them.
company.description4: Reliability, professionalism, and customer satisfaction are our most important principles. By acting with these values, we establish long-term and mutual trust-based business partnerships with our clients.

mission.title: Our Mission, Vision and Values
mission.subtitle: The principles and goals that guide us

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: To support companies operating in the maritime sector in carrying out their operations smoothly and efficiently by providing the highest quality shipping agency services. To gain the trust of our clients and establish long-term business partnerships.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: To become one of Turkey's leading shipping agency companies and be recognized as a reliable partner in the international maritime industry. To become a reference company in the sector with our innovation and continuous development-oriented approach.

values.title: Our Values
values.description: Reliability, professionalism, transparency, and customer satisfaction are our core values. We make a difference with 7/24 uninterrupted communication, the ability to produce quick solutions, and our ethical business understanding. We value our employees and believe in sustainable growth.

references.title: Our References
references.subtitle: Prestigious companies we work with that prove our reliability
references.quote: We make a difference in the maritime sector with our reliable business partnerships

experienced.title: Experienced Team
experienced.description: Our professional staff with years of knowledge and experience in the sector.

communication.title: 24/7 Communication
communication.description: Being accessible at all times and producing instant solutions.

expertise.title: İskenderun Port Expertise
expertise.description: Uninterrupted service with deep knowledge and experience at İskenderun Port.

reliability.title: Reliability
reliability.description: Long-term partnerships with our transparent and honest business understanding.

speed.title: Quick Solutions
speed.description: The ability to take effective and quick action for emergencies.

comprehensive.title: Comprehensive Services
comprehensive.description: All the services you need for your maritime operations.

cta.title: Would You Like to Work With Us?
cta.subtitle: If you are looking for a reliable partner for your maritime operations, you are in the right place
